data.text: @Martacifu2004 Hola, confirmanos si actualizaste los datos, a través del link brindado; de mostrarse algún error, te solicitamos nos envíes la imagen al DM. Quedamos atentos.
@iFabricioMatos Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@glavickas Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.

@chaporangaba Hello, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@GbAByYy11223344 Hi, in order to assist you please send us by private message the reservation code (6 letters) ore the ticket number (13 numbers), and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@sonshine1 Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

entity.name: It's Mother's Day
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text: Going back to mom is traveling to your origin, because they are our roots and the heart of our homes. These strong women raised us flying over all frontiers and gave us wings to fly without leaving aside their tenderness, love and affection. Have a happy Mother's Day, Mom!💞 https://t.co/PVe88NWSif
@karleguiluz Hi, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Milomik1 Hi, please send us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers), and the passenger's full name to check this further with you. We will be waiting for your reply.

@taylorjoanne Hi, we apologize for the response time, in order to assist you, please provide us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers), and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@nukuanz Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.
@TeCLaro Hemos brindado una respuesta vía DM. Saludos.

@NJMURRAY33 Hello, you should know that this is our contact center number for US residents 
1 866 435 9526
@MauroPinho83 Hello, we've set you a DM. Kind regards.
@karinam88 Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.

@GUTIERREZGRE Hi, we understand the inconveniences this situation has caused you, we suggest making the purchase with anticipation through our website, if does not work, get in contact with us in order to leave an internal note to respect the initial price due to inconsistencies. Regards.

Going back to mom is traveling to your origin, because they are our roots and the heart of our homes. This week is dedicated to the moms, and we want to thank them because they made us become the best version of ourselves through their love and affection. Have a happy day, Mom!💞 https://t.co/iXpaw17dWz
@camillecannada Hi, in order to assist you please provide us with more details through DM. We will be waiting for your reply.
@MauroPinho83 Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@karinam88 Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@MaikoAlmeida5 Hola, te respondimos vía DM, saludos.
@arenasleyva Esperamos hayas tenido un gran viaje y un lindo cumpleaños ✈️ 🤩 🎂
@KhaairMorrison Hello, please provide us by DM with your booking code (6 upper letters) email associated and the full name of the passenger. Regards.
@rn12klm Hi, please send us via DM in a detail way your doubts to assist through this channel. Regards.
@danithomer Hi, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Velascosancheza Hola, para que asistirte en tu consulta, escríbenos al DM. Saludos.
@rn12klm Hi, we have sent you a private message through Facebook. Regards.
@rn12klm We understand your annoyance and anger. You can raise a complaint on this link https://t.co/Ti1H3yuWLv. Regards.

data.text: @rn12klm Hello, we have checked that you've contacted us via FB. We will continue the assistance via Facebook. Kind regards.
@rn12klm Hello, please let us know if you have a case open with us (8 numbers) in order to check this further. We will wait for your reply.
@martik1214 Hola Martik, lo recomendable es que cuentes con la documentación solicitada para que no tengas inconvenientes al momento de tu viaje. Saludos.
@karinam88 Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.

Scams never look like scams! 🙂😈  We will never contact you through channels other than the official ones to recover personal belongings or change a ticket. https://t.co/J07iR2JyMf https://t.co/mJUYzWF68k

data.text: @tlmitc86 In order to protect your personal data and sensible information, we recommend you hiding your comment and send us the requested information via DM (private message). Regards.
@tlmitc86 Hi, please send us via DM your case number to check this with you further. Regards.
@raposete Please contact us via DM to validate the status of your case. Regards.
@raposete We ask you to write to us internally to provide you with a follow-up case number regarding your refund. Your case will continue to be reviewed by the area.
@itsmarianabby Hello, in order to check this further, please provide us by DM with your reservation code, along with the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@Dwhppe Hola,  envianos un DM con  detalles. Estaremos encantados de asistirte. Saludos.
@karinam88 Hi, in order to assist you, please provide us with the case number by a private message. We stay tuned.
@DR_Younger Hola, te escribimos vía DM. Quedamos atentos.
@dkeeper1981 Envíanos vía DM mayor información sobre tu requerimiento para poder asistirte. Quedamos atentos. ¡Saludos!

@CarinaAdC Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits, should start with 045) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@karinam88 Hello Sindy, we understand, and we are very sorry for the inconvenience caused, for which we sincerely apologize. This situation needs to be handled under a request so that we can review this issue. If you already have one created, please inbox us the case number. We stay tuned.
@Brunaleticiama Hi, in order to assist you please provide us with the details about your request by through DM. We stay tuned.
@danithomer We've sent you the case number by DM. Regards.

data.text: That's why we count on your support to follow the health regulations required by each country. Find out more information about government restrictions on our site: https://t.co/jbAvwePhAm (2/2)

#AttentionPassengers: despite the recent measures published by the United States government on the optional use of masks at its airports, the authorities of Brazil, Chile, Colombia and Peru require their use inside our aircraft. (1/2) https://t.co/fV900khNjs
@LexterObenario Hello, we have left you a message by inbox. Greetings

More than 4.3 million refugees from Ukraine have been forced to flee their homes, and @ACNURamericas supports those who need it most. We wanted to be part of this effort, and through a partnership with UNHCR, we will contribute #WithRefugees by bringing humanitarian aid for free. https://t.co/MdfiBBnOB6

data.text: @TheCoinsMummy Hi, we recommend you keep checking our website https://t.co/YDwtjS6mR5 and social networks, since any update or news will be published by those means. Kind regards.
@Npmrvas3 Hi, in order to carry the respective validation, please send us via DM the reservation code, passenger's full name, and the child's birthday. We look forward to your response. Regards
@lexfama Hola, gusto saludarte. Indicanos vía DM si podemos ayudarte en algo. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@MaikoAlmeida5 Hola, te hemos respondido a través de un DM.

@ecgand Hello, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@DavidMendezGead Hola, para asistirte envíanos por dm el código de reserva o número de ticket junto con tu nombre completo.
@TiagoMiojo Hello, your comments help us to improve our service, you can file a request on the following link https://t.co/9DAW5KbfSJ with your suggestions. Kind regards.
@allisonvbrown Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@Chris26tian10 Hi, we've sent a DM. Regards.
@AprilClaggett Hi, please let us know via DM if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.
@swissportNews I's an honor and privilege to be back! Connecting people is #WhatMakeUsFLy 💙❤️✈️

@ohhaiimconnie Hello, please tell us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. So we will review and provide you with options. We stay tuned.
@uktiago Hi, please send us via DM your refund request number to check this with you. Regards.
@puipiu33 Hello, please provide us by DM with your booking code (6 upper letters) email associated and the full name of the passenger. Regards.
@99angelf Debes de estar atento a tus medios de contacto. Saludos.
@007Travelbug Hello, please tell us in DM the number of the travel voucher, name of the owner, document number, type, country of issue, associated email and amount in the voucher. We stay tuned.
@99angelf Hola, puedes ingresar un reclamo formal ingresando a través del siguiente enlace https://t.co/o5ldLOY1vE. Saludos.

@Martacifu2004 Hola, entendemos tus comentarios, ten en cuenta que tu solicitud está actualmente en proceso. Tan pronto como tengamos el resultado de tu caso, nos comunicaremos contigo para hacértelo saber. Saludos.
@RudorferJakub Hello, we inform you that the prices may vary at any time without prior notice, and according to the taxes of each country. Regards.
@matt_klimek In this case we can assist you with the mileage accreditation to your LATAM Pass account, please send us the details via DM to continue. Regards.
@matt_klimek In this case it must be requested directly to Delta, we can assist you with the mileage accreditation to your LATAM Pass account. Regards.
@raposete Your refund has been entered in our system on March 30th. We appreciate your patience.
@matt_klimek Hi, you can validate your travel information by entering the following link: https://t.co/BLuBhtiLT9 with your booking reference and last name of the passenger. Regards.

data.text: @prematwit Hi, in order to protect you personal data and sensible information, we recommend you hiding your comment and send us via DM (private message) your case number to check this with you. Regards.

@raposete Hello, we checked your case and on March 30 the refund was requested again, under these protocol numbers 39809286 and 39809287. You'll be receiving the refund between 15 and 30 business days. Kind regards.
@prematwit Hello, please provide us via DM with your case or protocol number. We'll stay tuned.
@ManuelaScalini Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@matt_klimek Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@kaaaaatherine Hello, you can get in touch with our luggage department at the following link: https://t.co/ikcN58nGtP  Regards.

@juseraphim Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@dale_be_dale Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@petervalcarcel Hello Peter, you should know that in the following link you can generate a formal complaint, where you can express your discomfort, in this way our specialist area will analyze your situation. https://t.co/atLM9eBMif Best regards.

@24Anon08 Hello, if you refer to this reservation TZHXAT the seat selection is not available as the ticket belongs to Delta, and we can only signed seat at no cost, you'll receive a seat during the automatic check in or contact us 48 hours before departure. Kind regards.
